::DrillBit::

DrillBit blushed, at KitKat's coment. Suddenly an idea struck him.
He turned to KitKat.
"I have an idea. How about whene we get a chance, we pack up some food,
and things; and go out on a picnic. That sound nice?" He asked, KitKat.
He was falling more and more in love, with her.
